Reclusa::

She studied her room for a moment. "AH, a spider will have her nest.
Her way."  She started spinning web around what would pass for light
portals so it gave the effect of curtains.  She then looked at the
bed. "Hmm, this will never do.  She spun webbing around the four posts
so it made a hammock suspended above the bed.  

After nearly an hour, the room looked like a proper web nest.  Sure a
bot could enter, but unless they had careful footing, they would get
caught in the strands.  She did leave part of the living room open and
free of web so that her leader and co-bots could sit comfortably in
her quarters if needs be. She looked about in complete satisfaction.
"Ah, home sweet home. Now if I could only get a few maximal bodies to
litter about the place for aumbience, things would be just perfect.
But the little touches could wait. She walked outside of her room and
went to a wall com panel. "Perceptor, please give me the directions to
you. I wish to speak of a few...upgrades."
